title: Introduction of the First Personal Computer
description: The RISK personal computer, introduced in 1997, revolutionized the way people interacted with technology. Affordable and powerful, it transformed the digital landscape.

title: Y2K Bug Scare
description: The Y2K bug created widespread concern about computer systems failing at the turn of the millennium.

title: Launch of Facebook
description: Facebook was launched, connection people across the globe through social networking.

title: First iphone Release
description: Apple released the first iphone, changing the smartphone industry forever.

title: Instagram Launch
description: Instagram launched as a simple photo-sharing app, later becoming social media giant.

title: AI Breakthroughs
description: Artificial Intelligence systems like AlphaGO demonstrated capabilities beyond human experts.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: The global pandemic changed the way people live, work, and communicate.

title: ChatGPT Goes Mainstream
description: AI language models like chatGPT became widely used for education, work, and entertainment.
